trans-unit.source: Decision Structures (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 決策結構 (Visual Basic) |Microsoft 文件

trans-unit.source: Decision Structures (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 決策結構 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] lets you test conditions and perform different operations depending on the results of that test.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]可讓您測試條件，並執行不同的作業，根據該測試的結果。

trans-unit.source: You can test for a condition being true or false, for various values of an expression, or for various exceptions generated when you execute a series of statements.
trans-unit.target: 您可以測試條件為 true 或 false，針對各種不同值的運算式，或當您執行一系列的陳述式時，產生的各種例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a decision structure that tests for a condition being true and takes different actions depending on whether it is true or false.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示測試條件為 true，會採用不同的動作，取決於為 true 或 false 的決策結構。

trans-unit.source: ![Flow chart of an If...Then...Else construction](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/control-flow/media/ifthenelse.gif "IfThenElse")
trans-unit.target: ![If 的流程圖...然後...其他建構](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/control-flow/media/ifthenelse.gif "IfThenElse")

trans-unit.source: Taking different actions when a condition is true and when it is false
trans-unit.target: 條件為 true，而且是 false 時，採取不同動作

trans-unit.source: If...Then...Else Construction
trans-unit.target: 如果...然後...其他建構

trans-unit.source: `If...Then...Else` constructions let you test for one or more conditions and run one or more statements depending on each condition.
trans-unit.target: `If...Then...Else`語法結構，可讓您測試一個或多個條件，並執行一或多個陳述式，根據每個條件。

trans-unit.source: You can test conditions and take actions in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 您可以測試條件，並以下列方式採取動作︰

trans-unit.source: Run one or more statements if a condition is `True`
trans-unit.target: 如果條件為，執行一或多個陳述式`True`

trans-unit.source: Run one or more statements if a condition is `False`
trans-unit.target: 如果條件為，執行一或多個陳述式`False`

trans-unit.source: Run some statements if a condition is `True` and others if it is `False`
trans-unit.target: 執行某些陳述式，如果條件為`True`和其他人是否`False`

trans-unit.source: Test an additional condition if a prior condition is `False`
trans-unit.target: 如果先前的條件是，測試其他狀況`False`

trans-unit.source: The control structure that offers all these possibilities is the [If...Then...Else Statement](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/if-then-else-statement.md).
trans-unit.target: 提供所有這些可能性的控制結構是[如果...然後...Else 陳述式](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/if-then-else-statement.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can use a single-line version if you have just one test and one statement to run.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有一個測試和執行一個陳述式，您可以使用單行版本。

trans-unit.source: If you have a more complex set of conditions and actions, you can use the multiple-line version.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有一組更複雜的條件和動作，您可以使用多行版本。

trans-unit.source: Select...Case Construction
trans-unit.target: 選取 [...]Case 建構

trans-unit.source: The `Select...Case` construction lets you evaluate an expression one time and run different sets of statements based on different possible values.
trans-unit.target: `Select...Case`建構可讓您評估運算式一次，並執行不同的陳述式，根據不同的可能值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Select...Case Statement](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/select-case-statement.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[選取...Case 陳述式](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/select-case-statement.md)。

trans-unit.source: Try...Catch...Finally Construction
trans-unit.target: 請嘗試...Catch...最後的建構

trans-unit.source: `Try...Catch...Finally` constructions let you run a set of statements under an environment that retains control if any one of your statements causes an exception.
trans-unit.target: `Try...Catch...Finally`語法結構，可讓您執行一組保留控制項，如果任何一個陳述式會導致例外狀況的環境下的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: You can take different actions for different exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 您可以採取不同的例外狀況的不同動作。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally specify a block of code that runs before you exit the whole `Try...Catch...Finally` construction, regardless of what occurs.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地指定一段程式碼執行之前結束整個`Try...Catch...Finally`建構，不論執行的動作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Try...Catch...Finally Statement](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/try-catch-finally-statement.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[試...Catch...Finally 陳述式](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/try-catch-finally-statement.md)。

trans-unit.source: For many control structures, when you click a keyword, all of the keywords in the structure are highlighted.
trans-unit.target: 許多控制項結構，當您按一下關鍵字，所有的關鍵字，在結構中反白顯示。

trans-unit.source: For instance, when you click `If` in an `If...Then...Else` construction, all instances of `If`, `Then`, `ElseIf`, `Else`, and `End If` in the construction are highlighted.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，當您按一下`If`中`If...Then...Else`建構，而所有執行個體的`If`， `Then`， `ElseIf`， `Else`，和`End If`建構中會反白顯示。

trans-unit.source: To move to the next or previous highlighted keyword, press CTRL+SHIFT+DOWN ARROW or CTRL+SHIFT+UP ARROW.
trans-unit.target: 若要移至下一個或上一個反白顯示關鍵字，請按 CTRL + SHIFT + 向下鍵或 CTRL + SHIFT + 向上鍵。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱

trans-unit.target: [控制流程](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/control-flow/index.md)
